scripts.say: We meet again, my Royal adversaries. Or should I call you a royal pain in my ass?
I am Belfast, chief of the Royal Maids. The pleasure is all mine.
Had it not been for your fleet's sudden visit, I could have been in Scapa Flow by now, brewing the afternoon tea for the young mistress...
If you'll pardon my request, would you kindly scuttle yourself to make this easier for all parties involved?
Just as full of yourselves as ever, huh... I knew this battle would come one day.
Good timing, too! My cannons have been aching for some target practice to warm up in this freezing weather!
En garde, you pompous, tea-swigging bastards!
